item.title: We mean business
item.description:
We mean business

Ambassadors of Style is an entrepreneurship, technology and science innovation program that advances economic development in underprivileged areas through people development, workforce development and business acceleration.

item.title: Thoughts on The Happy Show Exhibit
item.description:
Thoughts on The Happy Show Exhibit

Recently, a few of us went to the Design Exchange winter exhibit: Stefan Sagmeister, The Happy Show. There has been a lot of buzz this past year over Sagmeister's upcoming feature film The Happy Film. Couple this with the sneak peek we were given during Sagmeister's talk at Design Thinkers last year, and we were pretty stoked to go check it out.

item.title: Louisiana State Museum and Sports Hall of Fame
item.description:
Louisiana State Museum and Sports Hall of Fame

The museum is configured to interpret athletics as a component of cultural history. While sports and regional history may appeal to different audiences, the exhibits and configuration explore interconnections between the two. The spaces flow visually and physically together, arranged to accommodate state-of-the-art exhibits, education, and assembly and support functions.

item.title: Touchscreen Projector @ Sharper Image
item.description:
Touchscreen Projector @ Sharper Image

Touchscreen Projector The Touchscreen Projector converts any wall or tabletop into an interactive touchscreen! It's ideal for business presentations, art, teaching, games, videos and more!

item.title: No Man's Sky's greatest resource is isolation
item.description:
No Man's Sky's greatest resource is isolation

Polygon 2 days ago Megan Farokhmanesh I left my first planet in the early hours of the morning. It was a simple affair, when all was said and done. I farmed resources; I fixed my ship; I rocketed into the atmosphere and beyond without a single false start or stumble.

item.title: 5 things to consider before you buy a portable drive
item.description:
5 things to consider before you buy a portable drive

CNET editor Dong Ngo explains the simplicity and practicality of portable drives and how to choose one that best fits your needs.

item.description:
If Your Flight Is Delayed, It's Probably Not Because of Bad Weather
